DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of bevacizumab for treatment of non-AMD choroidal neovascularization (CNV); eg:angioid streaks, ocular histoplasmosis, high myopia, idiopathic,etc
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Intravitreal Bevacizumab on Non -Age-Related Macular Degeneration (AMD) Related Choroidal Neovascularization (CNV)
DOC.criteria: Cases with subfoveal or juxtafoveal CNV due to a nonAMD related cause. Evidence of AMD
